select
live_id as liveId,title,viewers_number as viewersNumber,DATE_FORMAT(begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as beginTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endTime,DATE_FORMAT(actual_begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as actualBeginTime, DATE_FORMAT(actual_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as actualEndTime,stream_code as streamCode,speaker_name as speakerName, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime,status,is_del as isDel,school_name as name,push_client_ip as pushClientIp, video_frame_rate as videoFrameRate,bit_rate as bitRate,bandwidth as bandWidth,traffic_value as trafficValue
count(0) as totalCount
from live_program where
(
is_del=0 and status=1
is_del=0 and status=2
( status=3 or (status=2 and now()>end_time) ) and is_del=0
status=4
(is_del=0 and (status=1 or now() between begin_time and end_time)) or (is_del=0 and begin_time>now()) or ( ( status=3 or (status=2 and now()>end_time) ) and is_del=0 ) or ( status=4 )
)
and #{params.searchTime} BETWEEN begin_time AND end_time
and (begin_time like concat(#{params.currentDate},'%') or end_time like concat(#{params.currentDate}, '%'))
and begin_time>=#{params.beginTime} and end_time<=#{params.endTime}
order by status asc,begin_time asc limit #{params.start},#{params.pageSize}

select live_id as liveId,title,viewers_number as viewersNumber,DATE_FORMAT(begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as beginTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endTime,DATE_FORMAT(actual_begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as actualBeginTime, DATE_FORMAT(actual_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as actualEndTime,stream_code as streamCode,speaker_name as speakerName, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime,status,is_del as isDel,school_name as name,push_client_ip as pushClientIp, video_frame_rate as videoFrameRate,bit_rate as bitRate,bandwidth as bandWidth,traffic_value as trafficValue from live_program where
(
is_del=0 and status=1
is_del=0 and status=2
( status=3 or (status=2 and now()>end_time) ) and is_del=0
status=4

)
